item.title: Java Convert between Case Format of String using Google Guava
item.description: In this Java tutorial we learn how to use the com.google.common.base.CaseFormat class of Google Guava library to convert between various case formats of strings. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Google Guava library to the Java project To use the Google Guava library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation group: 'com.google.guava', name: 'guava', version: '30.1.1-jre' To use the Google Guava library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
